LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Quiver_Poison.label: Epona Poison Quiver
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Quiver_Poison.description: Poison Quiver. It's used for the Epona Ranger bow.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Pack_Carrot.label: Boomarrot Bag
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Pack_Carrot.description: It's a bag with 10 Boomarrots. It also has a self-destruct function.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Pack_Carrot.verbs.0.label: Throw!
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Pack_Carrot_Proj.label: Carrot
LanguageData.Epona_Pack_Bomb.label: 퍽탄
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Shield_Heater_Plain.label: Epona Shield
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Shield_Heater_Plain.descri: It's a shield that creates a small defensive field.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Shield_Heater_Hippogryph.d: It's a shield that creates a small defensive field. It is a royal coat of arms of House Ordinary Month.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Shield_Heater_Swords.label: 에포나 역장발생 방패 (쌍검)
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Shield_Heater_Swords.descr: It's a shield that creates a small defensive field. It is a royal coat of arms of House Varia.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Shield_Heater_Wine.label: 에포나 역장발생 방패 (와인잔)
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Shield_Heater_Wine.descrip: It's a shield that creates a small defensive field. It is a royal coat of arms of House Welch.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Hat_Helmet.label: Epona Helm
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Hat_Helmet.description: It is a helmet for Epona that can stop bullets.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Hat_EliteHelmet.label: Epona Elite Helm
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Hat_EliteHelmet.descriptio: This is an Epona helmet that can cover the entire face.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Hat_Tiara.label: Epona Tiara
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Hat_Tiara.description: This is a cute tiara for Epona.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Hat_Priest.label: Epona Priest Wreath
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Hat_Priest.description: It is a Wreath for priest.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Hat_Common.label: Epona Hat
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_BreastPlate.label: Epona Breastplate
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_BreastPlate.description: Breastplate enough to stop lead bullets.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_FullPlate.label: Epona Full Plate
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_FullPlate.description: It is a metal armor that covers the whole body..
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Farmer.label: Epona Farming Cloth
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Noble.label: Epona Noble Cloth
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_JackPlate.label: Epona Jack of Plate
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_BuffCoat.label: Epona Buff coat
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_BuffCoat.description: This is a sturdy leather coat that can stop some gunshots.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Priest.label: Epona Priest coat
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Child.label: Epona Child cloth
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Child.description: Children's costume. Pants are attached for easy temperature control. It is not suitable for adults, and it is better not to wear it as it is treated as a child the moment you put it on.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_PowerArmorMunition.label: Epona Munition Steam armor
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_PowerArmorMunition.descrip: It is a power armor that provides steam power.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_PowerArmor.label: Epona Royal Armor
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_PowerArmor.description: This is a powerful renaissance style power armor. Provides steam power.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_FurCape.label: Epona Fur cape
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_NobleCape.label: Epona Noble cape
LanguageData.EponaSquireEgg.label: Squire
LanguageData.EponaMercenaryRangedEgg.label: Epona Mercenary (Skirmisher)
LanguageData.EponaMercenaryMeleeEgg.label: Epona Mercenary (Vanguard)
LanguageData.Filth_Blood_Epona.label: blood
LanguageData.EponaBuildingTailor.label: Eponator-5500
LanguageData.EponaBuildingTailor.description: A modern sewing machine that works when you cut down a tree. It can sew even huge clothes.
LanguageData.EponaBuildingForge.label: Epona Forge
LanguageData.EponaBuildingForge.description: This is the traditional forge of Epona that uses wood as fuel.
LanguageData.EponaBuildingBombForge.label: Epona Explosive Forge
LanguageData.EponaBuildingBombForge.description: This is the traditional forge of Epona that uses boomarrot as fuel.
LanguageData.EponaBuildingBombGenerator.label: Explosive Generator
LanguageData.EponaBuildingMortar.label: Boomarrot Rotating Barrel Mortar
LanguageData.EponaBuildingMortar.description: A mortar with a rotating barrel that can fire rapidly. Used for base defense or siege.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_BuildingMortar_Proj.label: 폭당근
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_BuildingMortar.label: 박격포
LanguageData.EponaBuildingMonsMeg.label: Gordyfu Cannon
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_BuildingMonsMeg_Proj.label: 포탄
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_BuildingMonsMeg.label: 거포
LanguageData.Epona_Bombarrot_HE.label: Boomarrot
LanguageData.Epona_Bombarrot_HE.description: A wide carrot that can be used as currency or as a bomb. It is also used to make bomb liquor.
LanguageData.Epona_Cannonball.label: Gordyfu Cannonball
LanguageData.EponaBuildingOrganGun.label: Boomarrot Organ gun
LanguageData.EponaBuildingOrganGun.description: It is an organ cannon that can drive 12 carrots directly into the enemy's jaws before charging. Uses shredded Boomarrots as bullets
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_EponaBuildingOrganGun.label: 오르간포
LanguageData.Plant_Bombarrot.label: Boomarrot
LanguageData.Leather_Epona.label: Epona leather
LanguageData.Leather_Epona.description: Tanned, dried, scraped Epona skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
LanguageData.Epona_Sheep.label: Gordyfu
LanguageData.Epona_Sheep.description: A gordyfu is a gigantic genetically engineered sheep that takes its name from the Welsh word 'wedi gordyfu', meaning "overgrown". It has been adapted for wool and meat and is one of the most important livestock for the Epona nomads.
LanguageData.Epona_Sheep.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.Epona_Sheep_Leather.label: Gordyfu Leather
LanguageData.Epona_Sheep_Leather.description: Unlike wool, leather is a cool, breathable material.
LanguageData.Epona_Pwca.label: Pwca
LanguageData.Epona_Pwca.description: It is a crustacean that looks like a mixture of horse and deer, which Eponas believe are fairies. It has a fibrous shell. Produces rusthorn.
LanguageData.Epona_Pwca.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.Epona_Pwca.tools.1.label: left hoof
LanguageData.Epona_Pwca.tools.2.label: right hoof
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Broadsword.label: Eponic Broadsword
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Broadsword.description: It is a broadsword with a consistent design..
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Broadsword.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Broadsword.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Broadsword.tools.2.label: point
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Axe.label: Eponic Lochaber Axe
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Axe.description: It is an ax similar to a halberd. It has hooks and is said to be fatal to cavalry.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Axe.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Axe.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Axe.tools.2.label: point
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Claymore.label: Eponic War Saw
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Claymore.description: A circular saw with a small engine.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Claymore.tools.0.label: blade
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Lance.label: Eponic Lance
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Lance.description: A lance that can deliver a powerful blow with acceleration. Only Epona and Destrier can be equipped.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Lance.tools.0.label: blade
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Hammer.label: Eponic Warpick
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Hammer.description: A combat pickaxe that can inflict additional damage to hit targets.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Hammer.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Hammer.tools.1.label: pick
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Hammer.tools.2.label: point
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Handgun.label: Eponic Pepperbox Dual Pistol
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Handgun.description: Caracole's pistol that can project fire at close range.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Handgun.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Handgun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Handgun_Proj.label: pellet
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_RevolverShotgun.label: Eponic Revolver Shotgun
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_RevolverShotgun.description: It's a shotgun that's effective even at mid-range.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_RevolverShotgun_Proj.label: shotgun blast
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_HandcannonShotgun.label: Eponic Hand Cannon (Canister)
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_HandcannonShotgun.descripti: A shotgun hand cannon that boasts powerful firepower.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_HandcannonMortar.label: Eponic Hand Cannon (HE)
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_HandcannonMortar.descriptio: A hand cannon that is effective for attacking buildings.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_HandcannonMortar_Proj.label: grenade
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_SiegeArbalest.label: Eponic Siege Arbalest
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_SiegeArbalest.description: An effective siege crossbow against immobile enemies.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_SiegeArbalest.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_SiegeArbalest.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_SiegeArbalest_Proj.label: bolt
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_RangerBow.label: Eponic Ranger Bow
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_RangerBow.description: A bow made from the horns of Thrumbo. You can fire various arrows such as Solenarion (default), poison arrows, and explosive arrows.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_RangerBow.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_RangerBow_Proj.label: greatbow arrow
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_RangerBow_Proj_Poison.label: poison arrow
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_BoarSpear.label: Eponic Francisca
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_BoarSpear.description: It is the best friend of the Galloglass. Can thwart the enemy's defenses.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_BoarSpear.tools.0.label: shaft
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_BoarSpear.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_BoarSpear_Proj.label: francisca
LanguageData.Bow_Short_Proj_Poison.label: poison arrow
LanguageData.Bow_Recurve_Proj_Poison.label: poison arrow
LanguageData.Bow_Great_Proj_Poison.label: poison arrow
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Steamlance.label: Eponic Steamlance
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Steamlance.description: Steam Lance fires a grenade filled with compressed steam to perform a wide-area attack. Steam power required.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Steamlance.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Steamlance.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Steamlance_Proj.label: grenade
LanguageData.Gas_Steam.label: smoke
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Steamgatling.label: Eponic Steamgatling
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Steamgatling.description: A gatling gun that fires bullets with steam pressure. Steam power required.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Steamgatling.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Steamgatling.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Steamgatling_Proj.label: HMG Shot
LanguageData.EponaBuildingKitchen.label: Epona Kitchen
LanguageData.EponaBuildingKitchen.description: This is the kitchen of a modest epona. You can make Epona's food and it works with wood.
LanguageData.EponaHaySoup.label: Epona Hay Soup
LanguageData.EponaHaySoup.description: It's horse porridge. It's said to be the worst of the epona food called tasteless. But surprisingly, there are eponas that enjoy this.
LanguageData.EponaStarboomPie.label: Epona Starboom Pie
LanguageData.EponaStarboomPie.description: It's a large potato pie with a Bombarrots. There is a legend that eating makes you smarter for some reason.
LanguageData.EponaBombarrotCocktail.label: Epona Bomb Liquor
LanguageData.EponaBombarrotCocktail.description: It's a very strong Bombarrots liquor. Drinking this will strengthen your combat capabilities.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_NewShield_Light.label: Epona Light Shield
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_NewShield_Light.descriptio: It's a shield exclusively for cavalry. It has an appropriate defense.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_NewShield_Balistic.label: Epona Balistic Shield
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_NewShield_Balistic.descrip: It's a shield exclusively for cavalry. It's heavy, but you can defend against large-caliber bullets.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_EVA.label: Epona Spacesuit
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_EVA.description: It's an amazing spacesuit that works normally. Once again, it is a spacesuit.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Hat_EVA.label: Epona Spacehelm
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Hat_EVA.description: It's an amazing spacehelm that works normally. Once again, it is a spacehelm.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_LongRifle.label: Eponic Highland Long Rifle
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_LongRifle.description: It is a sniper rifle used by notorious mercenary units.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Steamflak.label: Eponic Steamflak
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Steamflak.description: Steamflak fires uranium APFSDS with tremendous kinetic energy at very long distances. Steam power required.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Swashbuckler.label: Eponic Swashbuckler
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Swashbuckler.description: A true hero has no cowardice! Two large-caliber pistol rounds are loaded.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_EqusCalibur.label: EqusCalibur
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_EqusCalibur.description: The Equscalibur is the legendary weapon of the first Epona king to the Eponas. For high-ranking nobles, a well-crafted replica of the Equscalibur is almost a necessity.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_LanceToranos.label: Toranos Lance
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_LanceToranos.description: “Silver for monsters. Steel for humans. EMP for Mechanoids.”
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_Alicorn.label: Uniponen Alicorn
LanguageData.AlicornMedicine.label: Alicorn Powder
LanguageData.AlicornMedicine.description: Alicorn powder that can be used as a medical product.
LanguageData.AlicornMedicineUltratech.label: Alicorn Medicine
LanguageData.AlicornMedicineUltratech.description: It is a high-end pharmaceutical product made using Alicorn powder.
LanguageData.EponaAlicornCocktail.label: Alicorn Elixir
LanguageData.EponaAlicornCocktail.description: It is said to heal diseases and permanent wounds caused by aging.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_NewShield_Medic.label: Uniponen Hospitaller Shield
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_NewShield_Medic.descriptio: This is a shield for cavalry only. It is less cumbersome to move than other shields and has high defense.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Hat_SlaveEarTag.label: Livestock management ear tag
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Hat_Winter.label: Epona Winter Hat
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Hat_Winter.description: It is a winter hat for Epona. It's warm!!!
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Hat_GuardianHelmet.label: Epona Guardian Helm
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Hat_GuardianHelmet.descrip: This is a very sturdy full-face helmet given to elite assault troopers, exclusively for Epona. However, the field of vision is limited when worn, so the shooting ability is lowered.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Adventurer.label: Epona Adventurer's Armor
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_Adventurer.description: Light chain armor and brigandine suitable for adventurers.
LanguageData.EponaBuildingLoom.label: Epona Loom
LanguageData.EponaBuildingLoom.description: It is a machine that makes high-quality fabric by intertwining threads. Make a tapestry too.
LanguageData.EponaCloth.label: Epona Quilt
LanguageData.EponaCloth.description: It is a sturdy and warm quilt. It is still weak against fire.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_BulletBow.label: Eponic Bulletbow
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_BulletBow.description: A crossbow that throws stones. It hurts a lot.
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_HandgunGatling.label: Eponic Dual Repeater
LanguageData.Epona_Weapon_HandgunGatling.description: Light gatling that can project overwhelming firepower at close range.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_DragoonPlate.label: Epona Reiter Plate
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_DragoonPlate.description: It is a metal armor that covers the whole body. Compared to the full plate, it lacks defense, but the arm part is lighter, allowing faster aiming.
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_FullPlateMedic.label: Uniponen Hospitaller Full Plate
LanguageData.Epona_Apparel_FullPlateMedic.description: It is a metal armor that covers the whole body. You can throw an Alicorn Medical Box that helps your allies, and improves the wearer's medical skills.
